/opt/apps/gcc/12.2.0/bin/g++ -O3 -DNDEBUG -pthread CMakeFiles/hpx_adjacent_difference.dir/adjacent_difference.cpp.o -o hpx_adjacent_difference  -Wl,-rpath,/work/karame.mp/build_dir/hpx/build/lib:/opt/apps/hwloc/2.7.1/lib /work/karame.mp/build_dir/hpx/build/lib/libhpx_wrap.a /work/karame.mp/build_dir/hpx/build/lib/libhpx_init.a /work/karame.mp/build_dir/hpx/build/lib/libhpx.so.1.9.0 /work/karame.mp/build_dir/hpx/build/lib/libhpx_core.so /usr/lib64/libtcmalloc_minimal.so /opt/apps/hwloc/2.7.1/lib/libhwloc.so -latomic -ldl -lrt -pthread -Wl,-wrap=main
